name: Green deal, or no deal?
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The Government’s flagship retrofit policy, Green Deal, faces a number of challenges; scepticism that there will be sufficient customer appeal for large scale take-up, a concern over a lack of industry experience and delivery capacity, and potential marginalisation of the SME supply chain. Will Green Deal be the stimulus needed to kick-start a nationwide UK low carbon retrofit programme and make a major contribution to 2050 targets, or will the opportunity for a truly local, sustainable and highly successful retrofit revolution be missed?  Join the debate as we hear a range of perspectives from some of the UK’s leading retrofit experts.
